EmailTemplate.description: New Account Request for Field Event
EmailTemplate.name: New Account Request for Field Event
EmailTemplate.subject: SFDC: New Account Request for Field Event Number {!Field_Event__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have created a Field Event referencing a temporary Account.
Field Event Number: {!Field_Event__c.Name} Report Type: {!Field_Event__c.Report_Type__c} Account Name: {!Field_Event__c.Account_Name__c}
Please fill in the new Account details in this email and send it to AeroSFDCCustomerMaster@honeywell.com. Please update the appropriate record in SFDC once you receive notification from AeroSFDCCustomerMaster@honeywell.com of the new Account.
This is a request to create a new account in SFDC.
Account Name: Account Market: Account Type: Account Business Segment/CBT: CBT Team: Street Address: City: State: Zip: Country: Phone Number: Fleet: Contact Name: Contact Street Address: Contact City: Contact State: Contact Zip: Contact Country: Contact Phone Number: Contact Email:
Click on the below link to view details:
{!Field_Event__c.Link}
Note to AeroSFDCCustomerMaster@honeywell.com: Please respond to sender once the account has been created.
Thank you, we appreciate your support!
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time.
Honeywell - Confidential
